item.description:
The Ocean State Follies takes on the 2008 political campaigns. By the end of October, we'll need the chuckle, no matter what we believe is the right choice for each of the elections.

Charlie Hall is back with his posse of punsters in this updated look at the elections which are only a few weeks from the show date! The Follies will be presenting custom-written songs and skits, while comic Frank O'Donnell, impressionists John Roarke and Ron Hayden, along with WPRO'S John DePetro and NBC-10's Gene Valicenti take their own personal pokes at the local and national election scene and we promise other comedy/celebrity surprises. Tix are $15 and $20- but please note: $5 OF EVERY TICKET WILL GO TO THE STATION MEMORIAL FOUNDATION- AND WILL BE MATCHED BY ALAN SHAWN FEINSTEIN!

I will order the tickets so we can be sure sit together as a group and collect money. No Maybe's. Cutoff date of 10/13 so that I can order the tickets.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at Theater Will Call at 7Pm...if you need a ride, let me know!
item.name: Ocean State Follies: CamPAIN 2008
